actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct certain pumping facilities for the Mammoth Spring National Fish Hatchery, Arkansas.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to construct certain pumping facilities for the Mammoth Spring National Fish Hatchery, Arkansas. Authorizes to be appropriated $50,000 to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to construct certain pumping facilities for the Mammoth Spring National Fish Hatchery, Arkansas.
